channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Takeaways from the Gene Hackman and Betsy Arakawa deaths investigation
item.description: Authorities say Gene Hackman spent his final years retired from acting, living with heart disease and Alzheimer’s.

item.title: After 40 years on the run, escaped prisoner located and caught
